    public class SumProductTableFactor
extends STableFactorDoubleArray
implements com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.kbest.IKBestFactor, ISTableFactorSupportingOptimizedUpdate
    Solver representation of table factor under Sum-Product solver.

      • cloneMessage

        public DiscreteMessage cloneMessage(int edge)
        Description copied from class: SNode
        Returns a clone of outgoing message for given edge.

        Overrides:
        cloneMessage in class SNode
        Parameters:
        edge - index in the range [0, SNode.getSiblingCount()-1].
        Returns:
        clone of message if applicable. May return null if there is no message or if subclass does not support messages. In the latter case, SNode.supportsMessageEvents() should return false.

        The default implementation returns null.

        Subclasses that override this method to return a non-null message should also override SNode.supportsMessageEvents().

      • setTableRepresentation

        protected void setTableRepresentation(IFactorTable table)
        Description copied from class: STableFactorBase
        Sets representation of table for optimal performance for particular solver implementation.

        Called by STableFactorBase.getFactorTable() the first time it is called on this object, and is also called by STableFactorBase.initialize().

        Specified by:
        setTableRepresentation in class STableFactorBase

      • supportsMessageEvents

        public boolean supportsMessageEvents()
        Description copied from class: SNode
        Indicate subclass has a concept of passing a IParameterizedMessage messages.

        Should only return true if:

        • SNode.cloneMessage(int) can return non-null message
        • SNode.messageEventType() is non-null
        • SNode.createMessageEvent(int, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage, com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages.IParameterizedMessage) can return a non-null event
        Since SVariableBase and SFactorBase implement the latter two methods, subclasses of those classes that support message events only need to implement SNode.cloneMessage(int) and this method.

        The default implementation returns false.

        Overrides:
        supportsMessageEvents in class SNode

      • enableOptimizedUpdate

        @Deprecated
public void enableOptimizedUpdate()
        Deprecated. 
        Enables use of the optimized update algorithm on this factor, if its degree is greater than 1. The optimized update algorithm is employed only when all of the factor's edges are updated together with an update call. If the schedule instead uses update_edge, the algorithm is not used.

        This method is deprecated; instead set UpdateOptions.updateApproach.

        Since:
        0.06

      • disableOptimizedUpdate

        @Deprecated
public void disableOptimizedUpdate()
        Deprecated. 
        Disables use of the optimized update algorithm on this factor.

        This method is deprecated; instead set UpdateOptions.updateApproach.

        Since:
        0.06
        See Also:
        enableOptimizedUpdate()

      • useDefaultOptimizedUpdateEnable

        @Deprecated
public void useDefaultOptimizedUpdateEnable()
        Deprecated. 
        Reverts to the default setting for enabling of the optimized update algorithm, eliminating the effect of previous calls to enableOptimizedUpdate() or disableOptimizedUpdate().

        This method is deprecated; instead reset UpdateOptions.updateApproach.

        Since:
        0.06

      • getEffectiveUpdateApproach

        public UpdateApproach getEffectiveUpdateApproach()
        Returns the effective update approach for the factor. If the update approach is set to automatic, this value is not valid until the graph is initialized. Note that a factor with only one edge always employs the normal update approach.
        Since:
        0.07

@Nullable
public UpdateApproach getAutomaticUpdateApproach()
